TopicTitle: Steam To KSP store Direct Download exchange/compatibility

Articles.Content: I purchased the Steam version of KSP a little over a year ago. Recently I purchased the Making History Expansion at the KSP web store via the link within my Steam client so I assumed that it would automatically directed me to the Steam version of the expansion pack. When I went to install the pack I found the link in the Steam version of the game had sent me to the purchase page for the Direct Download version of the Expansion. Is there any way to exchange the Direct Download version for a Steam Key or to make the Direct Download version work with the Steam game?
